citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, a tree was leaning on a fence at the outdoor enclosure for goats. Thus, pushing the fencing and
wooden support pole inside the enclosure. The outdoor facilities must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair
to protect the animals from injury and contain the animals. The licensee must find a way to ensure that the fencing and
wooden support pole at the outdoor enclosure for the goats is structurally sound and maintained in good repair to prevent
injury and contain the animals.
CORRECT BY: 24 JUNE 2024

At the time of inspection, an outdoor enclosure for 4 Macaws lacked adequate shelter. Adequate shelter is required to
provide shelter and protection for each bird from inclement weather and environmental conditions that may be harmful to
its health and well-being. The licensee must construct a shelter that protects them from the local climatic conditions and it
must provide sufficient space to comfortably hold all birds at the same time.
CORRECT BY: 14 JUNE 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
At the time of inspection, a tree was leaning on a fence at the outdoor enclosure for goats. Thus, pushing the fencing and 
wooden support pole inside the enclosure. The outdoor facilities must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair 
to protect the animals from injury and contain the animals. The licensee must find a way to ensure that the fencing and 
wooden support pole at the outdoor enclosure for the goats is structurally sound and maintained in good repair to prevent 
injury and contain the animals.  
 
CORRECT BY: 24 JUNE 2024 
3.152(b) 
   
Facilities, outdoor 
At the time of inspection, an outdoor enclosure for 4 Macaws lacked adequate shelter. Adequate shelter is required to 
provide shelter and protection for each bird from inclement weather and environmental conditions that may be harmful to 
its health and well-being. The licensee must construct a shelter that protects them from the local climatic conditions and it 
must provide sufficient space to comfortably hold all birds at the same time.  
 
CORRECT BY: 14 JUNE 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
